TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/TrayNotify/Background extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the background of the notification area. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrayNotify.Background.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.TrayNotify.Background class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the background of the notification area, which is located at the far right of the taskbar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrayNotify.Background.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrayNotifyBackground1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#331](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#331](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_0_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the background of the notification area.
Docs.value: A that represents the background of the notification area.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrayNotifyBackground1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#331](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/50a8da88-8043-46a1-9721-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#331](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/50a8da88-8043-46a1-9721-_1.vb)]
